name: old-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Old Rod list for an area, which are generally Magikarp or similar.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Use by any body of water to fish for wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Use by any body of water to fish for wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild POKéMON.
